```{r}
library(readr)
library(readxl)
library(janitor)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
europe_prod %>% 
    filter(industry == "Construction") %>% 
    arrange(desc(output_per_hour)) %>% 
    ggplot() +
    aes(x = reorder(country, -output_per_hour), y = output_per_hour, fill = country == "United Kingdom") +
    geom_col(colour = "white") +
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.3), legend.position = "none")
```
